string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake."
"Hate it or love it, the underdogs come out on top."
"You shouldn't throw stones if you live in a glass house and if you got a glass jaw, you should watch yo mouth: cause I'll break yo face."
"Im a trackstar running thru life, chasing my dream."
"Everyone else is just mad 'cause I came from the bottom wthout them."
"Don't much good come from me, but my music. Is a gift given from God so I'm gonna use it."
"I'm the type to swallow my blood 'fore I swallow my pride."
"Rappers are like fighters. They condition themselves to be the best."
"I, when I was just a kid, savored my skittles to ensure the luscious flavor."

"I had sex for the first time when I was 12-years-old with a grown-ass woman. Like, 22. She wasn't really attractive. I was a big 12-year-old though. I had no idea what I was doing, but I was ready! "
"A lot of kids join the Army to get a college education. That's why they do it, and they get sent into these horrible situations."
"A man becomes as attractive as an attractive woman when he becomes successful and is publicly noted. Power's an aphrodisiac."
"I think it's easier for the general public to embrace me in a negative way. You have people who already have a perception of me that says I'm a bad person."
"If they keep comin' at me, I'll just keep responding back until they don't exist anymore. I got the time and energy to ruin what is left of their careers, if they want to do that."
"I don't display emotions. I have every feeling that everyone else has but I've developed ways to suppress them. Anger is one of my most comfortable feelings."
"In my neighborhood if you're too aggressive, you intimidate someone, they kill you. Or if you decide to be emotional and you start crying, you're a victim."
"You know, the kid in the schoolyard that doesn't want to fight always leaves with a black eye."
"You have to find a way to stay in the middle, somewhere where people just don't mess with you because they know that you don't have a problem with it if it goes there."
"In Hollywood they say there's no business like show business in the hood they say there's no business like ho business."
"You shouldn't throw stones if you live in a glass house and if you got a glass jaw, you should watch yo mouth: cause I'll break yo face."
"I'm the type to swallow my blood 'fore I swallow my pride."
"Everyone else is just mad 'cause I came from the bottom wthout them."
"I'm a trackstar running thru life, chasing my dream."
"The only thing that I'm scared of is not livin' up to the expectations of Dr. Dre and Eminem."
"Don't much good come from me, but my music is a gift given from God so I'm gonna use it."
"Eminem is so talented it becomes annoying. Everytime we go to the studio, he's got something new to play and it's like \"Oh man, I gotta have something new to play, too\"."
"I don't get worked up or excited about situations I can't control because it's not in my power, so I might appear crazy to some people."
"To me, rappers are liars until I see that their actions coincide with what they said through the music. Me, I put my situations down and I make fun of them."
"I'm not in control of these situations and I feel like to be upset or down about something I can't control is just being weak and wasting energy."
"When I have conversations with people, for some strange reason they think I'm gonna die and they're not. But you know what? Death means nothing to me."
"Your first reaction is to move and then the shots is going off and you jumping around the backseat. I was scared the whole time. You supposed to die in that situation. They're not playing."
"I'm not in control of these situations and I feel like to be upset or down about something I can't control is just being weak and wasting energy."
"To me, rappers are liars until I see that their actions coincide with what they said through the music. Me, I put my situations down and I make fun of them."
"I don't get worked up or excited about situations I can't control because it's not in my power, so I might appear crazy to some people."
"Eminem is the rapper's rapper. He listens to everything. Every word, every slang, if you change something he's going to hear it all. "
"I was thinking of releasing the next album in November, but I'm gonna wait."
"Growing up, I was confused, my momma kissing a girl Confusion occurs, growing up in a cold world. "
"This is God's plan, homey, not mine... I am what I am. You can like it or love it."
"If you die in an elevator make sure you press the UP button."
"Show No Love , Cus Love Can Get U killed."
"What comes around goes around."
"Get rich are die trying."
"You shouldn't throw stones if you live in a glass house and if you got a glass jaw, you should watch yo mouth: cause I'll break yo face."
"Its not about the dog in the fight, its about the fight in the dog!"
"I've made so many mistakes, so many corrections. I'm so far from perfect so many imperfections. But I'm a go getta I get up and go get it, so if you preaching prosperity, i wanna hit it..."
"I spit sh*t, slick sh*t, so quick you miss it."
"All bulls**t aside, now it’s time to be honest. I fear no man, for death is all that’s promised."
"Here’s a jewel: Love your enemies and hate your friends. Your enemies remain the same — friends always change."
"Hate a liar more than I hate thief. A thief is only after my salary a liar is after my reality."
"I don’t think it makes me a role model. I think it makes me inspiring. Cause I’m from the bottom I think they look at me and go \"well, if he made it, I can make it\"."
"I’m not sensitive, I give people things exactly the way they are, and if they’re ready to absorb it, they will, and if they aren’t, they won’t."
"Love at first sight saves a lot of time."
"Lil bow wow the size of a mini teck, we ridin around with guns the size of 50 cent."
"Sunny days wouldnt be so special, if it wasnt for rain and joy wouldnt feel so good, if it wasnt for pain."
"If niggas so hot, why they aint got what i go.t My Maybach, my watch, my Hublo."
"I now know I'm here for a real reason. Cuz he got hit like I got hit and he ain't fuckin' breathin'"
"My fat knots, my swag is top notch. My crack spots bring in cash in non stop."
"Got shit locked, i stunt non stop I get it and i blow it how i want , why not?"
"9 millimeter, 9 shots, big rock 9 carat stones, im in my own zone."
"Outlaw yea yea we lawless. We ballin out yea regardless. VVS yea yea we flawless."
"You wanna get shot, go ahead run up on my spot. My lawyers will have me out by 1 oclock."
"My gun pop, tell me why would you try that. Porsche turbo, cayenne , ill buy that."
"G5 jet , pilot, i fly that. Burn good shit, get as high as i get."
"Groupie love bitch, your left breast ill sign that. Im CEO , Hoe you aint know?"
"New york party of the year, my spot. These bitches look so good, oh my god."
"Looking at the man in the mirror im so hot.Shorty wanna cut, cool make sure the door lock."
"Like pornstar took ya to my spot. My bed rock back and forth when im on top."
"My backshots they are sorta like crack rocks. I give it all i got, nonstop till sweat drop."
"I damage i wreck shop, i come thru correct i , I give her what she need, till its hard to breathe."
"When you come from where Im from, you come from the bottom, you aint supposed to get this rich!"
"What cha saying boy, you think Im playing boy, watch ya mouth girl, its a mans world."
"Listen, n-gga you play me, and Im gon go crazy, you push me Imma muthaf-cking trip."
"N-gga from JFK to Lax, im back through the sets again, gangsta life thats right, crazy ass mexicans."
"Next thing you know, they up in your crib, saying where is the stash at, you move they gon blast that."
